resources.string: On the way to the biggest race of his life, a hotshot rookie race car gets stranded in a rundown town and learns that winning isn\'t everything in life.
I wanted to give the folks a little sizzle. - Lightning McQueen

* Lightning McQueen 
* Mater 
* Sally Carrera 
* Doc Hudson 
* Chick Hicks
After his son is captured in the Great Barrier Reef and taken to Sydney, a timid clownfish sets out on a journey to bring him home.

In order to power the city, monsters have to scare children so that they scream. However, the children are toxic to the monsters, and after a child gets through, two monsters realize things may not be what they think.
You and I are a team. There is nothing more important than our friendship. –Mike Wazowski

* James P. "Sulley" Sullivan 
* Mike Wazowski 
* Boo 
* Randall Boggs 
* Henry J. Waternoose III
A look at the relationship between Mike Wazowski and James P. (Sully) Sullivan during their days at Monsters University, when they were not necessarily the best of friends.
"You and me together, that's how it should always be. One without the other don't mean nothing to me." - Mike and Sulley

* James P. "Sulley" Sullivan 
* Mike Wazowski 
* Randy Boggs (Randall) 
* Dean Hardscrabble 
* Don Carlton
A rat who can cook makes an unusual alliance with a young kitchen worker at a famous Paris restaurant.
"If you focus on what you left behind you will never see what lies ahead." - Gusteau

* Remy 
* Alfredo Linguini 
* Colette Tatou 
* Anton Ego 
* Chef Skinner

The magically long-haired Rapunzel has spent her entire life in a tower, but now that a runaway thief has stumbled upon her, she is about to discover the world for the first time, and who she really is.
"I have magic hair that glows when I sing." - Rapunzel

* Rapunzel 
* Flynn Rider (Eugene Fitzherbert) 
* Mother Gothel 
* Pascal (chameleon) 
* Maximus (horse)
While trying to lead a quiet suburban life, a family of undercover superheroes are forced into action to save the world.
"I never look back, darling. It distracts from the now." - Edna Mode

* Bob Parr / Mr. Incredible 
* Helen Parr / Elastigirl 
* Violet Parr 
* Dash Parr 
* Jack-Jack Parr 
* Syndrome (Buddy Pine)
Lion prince Simba and his father are targeted by his bitter uncle, who wants to ascend the throne himself.
"Remember who you are. You are my son, and the one true king." - Mufasa

* Simba 
* Mufasa 
* Scar 
* Nala 
* Timon 
* Pumbaa
A cowboy doll is profoundly threatened and jealous when a new spaceman action figure supplants him as top toy in a boy bedroom.
This isn’t flying. This is falling with style. - Buzz Lightyear

* Woody 
* Buzz Lightyear 
* Rex 
* Slinky Dog 
* Mr. Potato Head 
* Bo Peep
78-year-old Carl Fredricksen travels to Paradise Falls in his house equipped with balloons, inadvertently taking a young stowaway.
"Thanks for the adventure. Now go have a new one." - Ellie

* Carl Fredricksen 
* Russell 
* Dug (dog) 
* Kevin (bird) 
* Charles Muntz
A robot who is responsible for cleaning a waste-covered Earth meets another robot and falls in love with her. Together, they set out on a journey that will alter the fate of mankind.
"I don't want to survive. I want to live!" - Captain

* WALL·E 
* EVE 
* M-O (Microbe Obliterator)
